page.title: 03Where People Work
page.content: When the houses were first built in this area most people worked in or around{Coalville.}Many of the men worked in{Snibston}or{Whitwick {Collieries;}others worked in factories in the centre of Coalville,on the railway or in one of the local quarries. Many people in the area now work further afield,mainly in{Leicester}or {Loughborough}and since the completion of the{M1 motorway,}with an access point only four miles away,{Nottingham and{Derby}have become easy to reach.Facilities in these towns are now also used by local people for leisure and shopping.
